title: Can CSS display custom fonts (not images)
content:
I think Adobe or Microsoft tried to do this. Or is flash the only real solution for this?

 [‹ Something about the Brain](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821152546/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44012 "Go to previous forum topic") [Unicode 5: no Ruble yet ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821152546/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43940 "Go to next forum topic")
author: BaB

comments.content:
CSS is still only able to specify preinstalled fonts on the user’s system. However read this post about Safari and CSS3

[http://www.typophile.com/node/43971](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821152546/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43971 "http://www.typophile.com/node/43971")

-Rafe
